scripts.test: PLAYWRIGHT_HTML_OPEN=never npx bddgen && npx playwright test
scripts.export:steps: npx bddgen export # look for more info - https://vitalets.github.io/playwright-bdd/#/cli?id=bddgen-export
scripts.postinstall-browserstack: npx browserstack-node-sdk playwright install && cd support/test-app-ui && npm install && cd - && cd support/test-app-api && npm install && cd - && npx husky init
scripts.test-browserstack: PLAYWRIGHT_HTML_OPEN=never npx bddgen && npx browserstack-node-sdk playwright test
scripts.test:ui-browserstack: npx bddgen && npx browserstack-node-sdk playwright test --ui
scripts.test:debug-browserstack: npx bddgen && npx browserstack-node-sdk playwright test --debug
scripts.export:steps-browserstack: browserstack-node-sdk npx bddgen export # look for more info - https://vitalets.github.io/playwright-bdd/#/cli?id=bddgen-export
